title: Oats + banana
description: A healthy breakfast of oats with sliced banana and milk.
steps: Cook oats in milk for 5 minutes.
Slice banana and add on top.
Drizzle honey if desired and serve.

title: Poha
description: Flattened rice cooked with vegetables and spices.
steps: Rinse poha in water and drain.
Sauté onions and peas with mustard seeds and turmeric.
Garnish with lemon juice and coriander.

title: Paneer paratha
description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced paneer filling.
steps: Prepare dough with flour and water.
Mix crumbled paneer with spices for filling.
Roll dough, stuff with paneer, and cook on pan with ghee.

title: Brown rice + dal
description: A simple and nutritious lunch of brown rice with lentil curry.
steps: Prepare dal by cooking lentils with onion, tomato, and spices.

title: Chapati + paneer curry
description: Soft whole wheat flatbread served with paneer curry.
steps: Prepare chapati dough and cook on pan.
Cook paneer curry with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

title: Quinoa + veg curry
description: Protein-rich quinoa served with mixed vegetable curry.

title: Apple + almonds
description: Simple and healthy snack of sliced apple with almonds.
steps: Serve with a handful of almonds.

title: Smoothie
description: A delicious fruit smoothie to refresh and energize.
steps: Blend banana, berries, yogurt, and honey until smooth.

title: Roasted chickpeas
description: Crunchy and healthy snack made from roasted chickpeas.
steps: Toss chickpeas with oil and spices.
Roast in oven at 200°C for 20–25 minutes.

title: Khichdi + salad
description: Comforting dish of rice and lentils served with fresh salad.
steps: Cook rice and lentils together with spices.

title: Tofu curry + rice
description: Protein-rich tofu curry served with steamed rice.

title: Moong dal cheela
description: Savory pancakes made from moong dal, rich in protein.
steps: Grind soaked moong dal into a batter.
Cook on pan like pancake with oil.

title: Boiled eggs + toast
description: A simple protein-rich breakfast with boiled eggs and toasted bread.
steps: Serve eggs with toast, sprinkle salt and pepper.

title: Chicken sandwich
description: A quick sandwich with chicken filling, veggies, and spices.
steps: Place filling between bread slices with lettuce and tomato.

title: Grilled chicken + rice
description: Nutritious grilled chicken served with steamed rice.
steps: Marinate chicken with spices and grill until cooked.

title: Fish curry + chapati
description: Traditional fish curry served with soft chapati.
steps: Cook fish curry with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Serve hot fish curry with chapati.

title: Egg curry + quinoa
description: Spicy boiled egg curry served with quinoa.
steps: Boil eggs and prepare curry with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

title: Grilled fish + salad
description: Light meal with grilled fish and fresh vegetable salad.
steps: Marinate fish with lemon and spices, then grill.

title: Chicken curry + rice
description: Spicy chicken curry paired with steamed rice.
steps: Cook chicken curry with onion, tomato, and spices.

title: Omelette + veggies
description: Fluffy omelette served with sautéed vegetables.
steps: Whisk eggs with spices and cook as omelette.
